function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Variation in compliance may be influenced by substantive moral support for measures and perception of costs and strain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of moral appeals for compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of sanctions for non-compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-reported behavior studies may not capture the full extent of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on de-identified cell-phone data to assess compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive studies on compliance factors for covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social distancing measures not being followed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay-at-home orders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in sustaining long-term compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of sars-cov-2 with sars-cov-1","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of recommendations from global conferences on economic crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to transform crisis into an opportunity for social and environmental reimagining","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in coordinating a response to the crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective regulation of supply chains and global corporations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rebuilding public healthcare infrastructure","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in responding to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undermining of the who and inadequate global responses to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited civil liberties due to containment measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authoritarian measures in response to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of neoliberalism as a remedy to pandemic-related failures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gig workers continue to work despite covid-19 symptoms, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequalities in employment standards for gig workers exacerbate existing disparities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmentation of employment services and vocational training creates challenges for displaced workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of temporary migrants from economic stimulus and welfare packages","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of an underclass of migrant workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited utility of new policy measures for temporary migrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal impact of government measures on young workers and immigrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of migrant workers to exploitation and abuse","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusionary migration policy exacerbating socio-economic disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise of insecure work arrangements including casual, fixed term, and market-mediated arrangements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hysteresis in the labor market","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in people queuing in front of centrelink offices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job losses of 14%-25% with low-income workers twice as likely to be affected","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematic flaws in the operation of state enforcement regimes, resulting in widespread employer non-compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of concerted and coordinated global effort","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown in china affecting australian economy","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Widespread loss of jobs, hours, and income","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid outflow of capital from emerging countries leading to economic instability and poverty","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Projected job losses and income reduction worldwide","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus hotspots in urban slums and refugee camps","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourism industry collapse","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Falls in remittances by migrants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chains restructuring and nearshoring may lead to smaller headcounts and vulnerable workforces in emerging economies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domestic supply chain for critical medical supplies like ventilators.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National self-sufficiency and local manufacturing as a response to global crises.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on global supply chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on global food supply chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
